question: 浅い
userAnswer: shallow/superficial (water | wound | sleep | colour | knowledge | experience)
activeAnswer: shallow/superficial (water | wound | sleep | colour | knowledge | experience)
sourceMnemonic: This is a single kanji with an <ja>い</ja> on the end, meaning you know it's probably an adjective. What's the adjective form of <kanji>shallow</kanji>? It's <vocabulary>shallow</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading is the one you learned with the kanji, making this <ja><reading>あさ</reading>い</ja>
